400.title: Bad Request
400.message: Your request is malformed or invalid. Please check your input and try again.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: Access is denied. Please provide valid credentials or authenticate to access this resource.

402.title: Payment Required
402.message: Payment is required to access this resource. Please complete the payment process.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You do not have permission to access this resource. Please contact the administrator for assistance.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource could not be found. Please verify the URL and try again.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.message: The HTTP method used is not allowed for this resource. Please use a different method.

406.title: Not Acceptable
406.message: The requested resource cannot be provided in the format you specified. Please adjust your request.

407.title: Proxy Authentication Required
407.message: Authentication with the proxy server is required. Please provide valid proxy credentials.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The server timed out while waiting for your request. Please try again.

409.title: Conflict
409.message: There is a conflict with the current state of the resource. Please resolve the conflict and try again.

default.title: Ops, an unexpected error has occurred
default.message: I'm sorry, but an error has occurred, please try again later
